scripts.test:e2e:coverage: rm -rf coverage && mkdir -p coverage/e2e-v8 && NODE_V8_COVERAGE=coverage/e2e-v8 PG_DATAQUEUE_DATABASE=${PG_DATAQUEUE_DATABASE:-postgres://postgres:postgres@localhost:5432/e2e_test} dataqueue-cli migrate && NODE_V8_COVERAGE=coverage/e2e-v8 playwright test && c8 report --temp-directory coverage/e2e-v8 --reporter=text --reporter=html --reporter=lcov --report-dir coverage
